content: 详细介绍： Prof. Dr. Peter Braun is Professor of Computer Science at the University of Applied Sciences Würzburg-Schweinfurt in Germany. He is currently serving as Dean of the Faculty of Computer Science and Business Information Systems. His teaching focuses on operating systems, distributed systems, and mobile applications. In this research, Peter focuses on model-driven software development and on the development of Domain Specific Languages for REST-ful applications.
title: Peter Braun
